alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:31AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sevier and northern McCurtain Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 331 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles southwest of Octavia, or 27 miles southeast of Clayton, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Gillham, Plunketville, Smithville, Hochatown, Watson, Bethel, Battiest, Pickens, Mount Herman and Sherwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
